name: Div Shekhar
title: Generative AI Specialist
bio: Div Shekhar is a seasoned technology leader who currently heads the Generative AI Partner Business Development for Amazon Web Services (AWS) across Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA). With over four years at AWS, Div has been instrumental in fostering and expanding relationships with key partners, helping organizations leverage the power of generative AI technologies to drive innovation and digital transformation. His technical background enables him to bridge the gap between complex technological solutions and business outcomes effectively. Div is originally from the AWS USA, but currently works at AWS in Barcelona, Spain.
session_titles: Navigating the AWS Agentic AI Marketplace: A Practical Guide
